name: 10% Discount (Stolen Portrait of a Man in a Red Turban)
description:
10% Discount for the collectors who decyrpted the message inside "Stolen Portrait of a Man in a Red Turban"

How the ticket discount works?

1. Collect one of stolen series, check the ammount of the discount, and decrypted the message.
2. DM for the message you decrypted to twitter: @prasdiman or instagram @prasdiman.
3. I'll check the message you decrypted.
4. Discount ticket will be airdropped into your wallet.
5. Choose my artworks you want to collect.
6. Burn the discount ticket, i'll check it manually.
7. I'll change the price of my artwork.
8. Huwala you got a discount.
